content.question: The instantaneous rate of change of the vector-valued function <math alttext="g of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext=" r of t, equals, open angled bracket, the square root of t squared, plus 1, end root, comma, the sine of, open parenthesis, t squared, close parenthesis, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. If <math alttext="g of 7, equals, open angled bracket, the square root of 2, comma pi, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></math>, which of the following is <math alttext="g of 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext=" open angled bracket, negative 26.071, comma negative 0.606, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26.071</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.606</mn></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 24.657, comma 2.536, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24.657</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2.536</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 4.657, comma 4.095, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4.657</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>4.095</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 27.485, comma 3.747, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mn>27.485</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3.747</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 24.657, comma 2.536, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24.657</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2.536</mn><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
